conbody.p: The Add URL button in Files to send panel (see section _fixme_ [xref]) opens a dialog box where you can insert an internet hyperlink in lieu of a local file.
Use the Title _fixme_ [ui] field to name the hyperlink. Enter a WWW address to the URL field either manually or pasting it from the clipboard.
conbody.note: The hyperlink address must be entered in full. For example, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AsJApGdm97c as opposed to www.youtube.com/watch?v=AsJApGdm97c or even youtube.com.
